scripts.test:tapjs: cd packages/tapjs && npm run test -s || exit 0
scripts.test:tapjs-better: cd packages/tapjs && npm run test:better -s || exit 0
scripts.test:tapjs-inline: cd packages/tapjs && npm run test:inline -s || exit 0
scripts.test:ben-windows: hyperfine.exe --warmup 1 --runs 2 "pnpm run test:jasmine" "pnpm run test:jasmine-better" "pnpm run test:jest" "pnpm run test:jest-better" "pnpm run test:jest-inline" "pnpm run test:vitest" "pnpm run test:vitest-better" "pnpm run test:vitest-inline" "pnpm run test:vitest-no-isolate" "pnpm run test:mocha" "pnpm run test:mocha-better" "pnpm run test:qunit" "pnpm run test:ava" "pnpm run test:ava-inline" "pnpm run test:tape" "pnpm run test:tapjs" "pnpm run test:tapjs-better" "pnpm run test:tapjs-inline" "pnpm run test:uvu"
scripts.test:ben-linux: hyperfine --warmup 1 --runs 2 'pnpm run test:jasmine' 'pnpm run test:jasmine-better' 'pnpm run test:jest' 'pnpm run test:jest-better' 'pnpm run test:jest-inline' 'pnpm run test:vitest' 'pnpm run test:vitest-better' 'pnpm run test:vitest-inline' 'pnpm run test:vitest-no-isolate' 'pnpm run test:mocha' 'pnpm run test:mocha-better' 'pnpm run test:qunit' 'pnpm run test:ava' 'pnpm run test:ava-inline' 'pnpm run test:tape' 'pnpm run test:tapjs' 'pnpm run test:tapjs-better' 'pnpm run test:tapjs-inline' 'pnpm run test:uvu'
